headline.main: NEW TIES ARE SEEN IN AID TO ENGLAND; Mrs. Murrow, London Agent of Bundles for Britain, Reports Here on Effect of Relief

lead_paragraph: The aid given by Bundles for Britain and other war relief organizations has brought a new bond of good-will and friendship between England and this country, Mrs. Edward R. Murrow, London representative of Bundles for Britain, reported yesterday at a luncheon in her honor at the Hotel Astor.
abstract: Mrs E R Murrow testimonial luncheon
